messages.messageBody:
Subject: Re: Learning plateaus.....Does lots of books

grlynbl@... writes:
> now thinking about that makes me consider taking another stab at
> conquering the biscuit challange. lol.. OR, I could just call Moma
and ask
> her to
> make me some :-)
>
> Teresa

<<There has to be something "special" to baking pie crusts and
biscuits... >>

Ah, biscuits, I just made some last nite, very good!!! So I can make
those,
hey everyone..i just had to add my 2 cents..i have been told i was a good cook, but i struggled for years with biscuits, my husband (who cant cook) made better biscuits than me! well.. i discovered that buttermilk makes the difference! and if u dont have buttermilk, u can make your own..with a tablespoon of lemon juice added to a cup of milk (roughly, it doesnt have to be exact)..and i also discovered that for pie crusts...if they look really bad, then they taste good! dont understand what that's about..maybe just not handling them too much.. well happy biscuit making! cya, marybeth
